verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: disclosed] [ARG1: reimbursement payment] [ARGM-TMP: last year] [C-ARG1: of more than $ 100,000] [ARG2: to his personal attorney , Michael Cohen ,] [ARGM-LOC: in financial documents released Wednesday] .
President Donald Trump disclosed reimbursement payment last year of more than $ 100,000 to his personal attorney , Michael Cohen , in [ARG1: financial documents] [V: released] [ARGM-TMP: Wednesday] .
